TextStringDefinition.TextString: Warning! Changing sex settings with running sex interactions can cause issues!\n\nEnd running sex interaction first to avoid possible problems.
Change sex settings.\n\nThese settings affect only sex related functions like gender role recognition, positions progression, autonomy, outfit or pregnancy.
This option requires restarting the game to take full effect!\n\nSave and restart for this setting to work.
Check to allow teen age Sims to participate in sex interactions.
Check to allow Sims to talk after finishing sex.
Check to automatically silence Sim phone during sex.
Change behavior of sex animations progression.
Player Sex Interaction duration related settings.
Sex interaction duration in realtime minutes.\n(Default: 3)
Sex interaction ends only after a climax sex animation.
Choose the type of sex animations progression.
Sex animations will not change on their own.
Sex animations will only change to animations that are in their stage list.
Sex animations will change according to their stage list and continue afterwards.
Sex animations will always change to a random available animation.
Set a keyboard key (4-9, A-Z) for progressing the sex interaction.\n(Default: Q)
Progression to the next sex animation category has to be allowed by the user.
Check to allow sex animations progression to continue after playing a climax animation.
Change Sims outfits behavior in sex.
Choose the type of undressing behavior Sims will follow during sex.
Choose the type of undressing behavior NPC Sims will follow during sex.
Sims in sex will not undress automatically.
Sims in sex will undress automatically according to the sex animations configuration.
Sims in sex will always undress completely.
Sims dressing up behavior after sex. Fully Check for Sims to always dress up after sex. Half Check for Sims to dress up after sex when outdoors. Uncheck for Sims to never dress up after sex.
Check to automatically undressed strapons when not needed in the currently playing animation.
Choose the type of sex initiation.
Sex will start with Sims talking and then walking to the sex location.
Sex will start instantly, teleporting Sims to the sex location.
Check to detect Height Slider mods and adjust Sims height during sex.\nUncheck to ignore Height Slider mods.
Check to allow Sims in sex to adapt to the animation roles requirements and disable automatic reassignment when swapped to opposite roles.
Check to reserve objects used for sex. Reservation prevents Sims from using the objects while they are being used for sex.
Override of sex animations duration in realtime seconds.
Use animations duration time defined by the author.
Override duration for all sex animations in realtime seconds.\n\nAnimations will not play exactly for the set amount out time. They will play for the approximate number of loops for the set time.
Check to enable Sims Sex Autonomy.
Choose an intensity preset for autonomy.\n(this alters the Autonomy Awareness settings, Autonomy Triggers settings, and Autonomy Specifics settings)
Select for less frequent sex, higher Sims and Location precision, slower cooldowns.
Select for default settings for Sex Autonomy.
Select for more frequent sex, higher chances, quicker cooldowns.
Select for very frequent sex, very high chances, relationships don't matter, almost no cooldowns.
Choose which types of autonomy are allowed to run.
Check to allow Sims to perform random sex interactions with other Sims.
Check to allow Sims to perform random masturbation interactions.
Check to allow Sims to try to join existing sex interactions.
Check to allow Sims to perform random sex interactions when travelling to locations. Active household Sims and Sims in travel groups are not included.
Check to allow Sims to initiate sex from romantic conversations.
Check to allow Sims to perform masturbation interactions while watching sex.\n\n(requires Amra72 and ooOLaLa World animations)
Check to allow Sims to perform sex interactions when at a sex club gathering.
Check to allow Sims to invite in and perform sex interactions with peeping Sims.
Choose which elements are considered when triggering autonomy.
Check to allow Player Sims to participate in Sex Autonomy.
Check to allow Player Sims to join to existing sex interactions.
Check for Sims to stay faithful to their partner and not have sex with others.\n\nThe 'Polyamorous' and 'Noncommittal' traits on Sims ignore this setting.
Check for NPC Sims to avoid sex if they have a high chance of getting pregnant.\n(only works with Menstrual Cycle Pregnancy Mode enabled)

Check to allow the game and individual Sims to remember locations used for sex by the player and preference them in the future.\nUncheck to disallow the game and individual Sims from remembering preferenced sex locations and pick them randomly.

Check to allow the game and individual Sims to remember sex animations used by the player and preference them in the future.\nUncheck to disallow the game and individual Sims from remembering preferenced sex animations and pick them randomly.
Check for Sims to avoid attempting sex when children are on the lot.\nUncheck for Sims to attempt sex when children are on the lot.

Check for Sims to respect their own and participants gender preference when asking to join sex. (Decreases Joining Autonomy)\nUncheck for Sims to only match gender preference with any single participant when asking to join sex. (Increases Joining Autonomy)
Check for Sims to respect doors gender specific lock.\nUncheck for Sims to be able to walk through gender specific locked doors.
Check for Sims to assess risk of having sex by their age, number of Sims around, number of children around, and family relations.
Edit specific parts of autonomy and mess up everything.
Set a multiplier value of the random sex timer. Higher values make autonomy slower, lower values make autonomy faster.\n(Default: 1.2, Minimum: 0.01)
Set a unit interval value for chance of random solo sex occurring. Value 1.0 is 100% chance.\n(Default: 0.45, Minimum: 0.0)
Set a unit interval value for chance of random sex occurring when travelling to a location. Value 1.0 is 100% chance.\n(Default: 0.50, Minimum: 0.0)
Set a maximum number of distance units for Sims to detect sex in and consider joining it.\n(Default: 18.0, Minimum: 1.0)
Set a unit interval value for chance of random club sex occurring. Value 1.0 is 100% chance.\n(Default: 1.0, Minimum: 0.0)
Set a unit interval value for chance of random solo sex occurring from watching sex. Value 1.0 is 100% chance.\n(Default: 0.10, Minimum: 0.0)
Set a unit interval value for chance of random sex from romantic conversations occurring. Value 1.0 is 100% chance.\n(Default: 0.10, Minimum: 0.0)
Set a unit interval value for chance of random sex from positive reaction to a peeping Sim. Value 1.0 is 100% chance.\n(Default: 0.50, Minimum: 0.0)
Set a number of attempts for autonomy picking a Sims Sex Pair and Sex Location Style. Higher values decrease the failure rate.\n(Default: 5, Minimum: 1, Maximum: 120)
Set a number of Sims Sex Pairs that will be considered for autonomy. Lower values mean more precision in picking ideal sex pairs.\n(Default: 8, Minimum: 1)
Set a number of Sex Locations that will be considered for autonomy. Lower values mean more precision in picking ideal locations.\n(Default: 8, Minimum: 1)
Set a minimum number of actors that every sex interaction can be made out of by autonomy joining.\n\n(Default: 3, Minimum: 2)
Set a number of extra points NPC Sims Pairs gain when creating sex pairs. Sims need at least 2.15 points to create a Sex Pair.\n(Default: 1.0)
Player to NPC Sims Relationship Modifier
Set a number of extra points Player+NPC Sims Pairs gain when creating sex pairs. Sims need at least 2.15 points to create a Sex Pair.\n(Default: 0.0)
Choose and Set allowed for autonomy location styles.
Check to allow picking of sex locations outside of the lot boundaries.
Check to allow picking of sex locations outdoors within lot boundaries
Check to allow picking of risky sex locations.
Check to allow picking of comfortable sex locations.
Check to allow picking of private sex locations.
Set a multiplier value per 'Sim In Room' that increases the likeliness of the room being considered as risky.\n(Default: 2.0, Minimum: 0.0)

Set a number of extra relationship points to add to the average of an NPC Household's relationship value when considering sex while an active Sim is visiting a residential lot.\n(Default: 0, Minimum: 0)
Set cooldown timers for autonomy sex.
Set a number of minimum realtime seconds Sims wait before attempting autonomy sex again.\n(Default: 90, Minimum: 0)
Set a number of maximum realtime seconds Sims wait before attempting autonomy sex again.\n(Default: 1800, Minimum: 1)
Set a number of minimum realtime seconds Sims wait before attempting autonomy club sex again.\n(Default: 45, Minimum: 0)
Set a number of maximum realtime seconds Sims wait before attempting autonomy club sex again.\n(Default: 90, Minimum: 1)

Display Player Asking Player Sex Dialog

Choose the type of how Sims gender is recognized.
Select to recognize Sims gender by biological characteristics of their genitalia.
Select to recognize Sims gender by CAS 'Custom Gender Settings'.
Select to not recognize Sims gender at all.
Check to recognize female actor roles as both female and male roles (M/M).\n(allows male Sims to play female roles)
Check to recognize male actor roles as both male and female roles (F/F).\n(allow female Sims to play male roles)
Check to enable 'Gender Recognition' interactions that allow to decide about individual Sims gender role.
Check to disable restrictions for animations that require specific occult to be available.\n(Sims require an occult, like vampire, alien or ghost, to use animations with occult restrictions)
Check to enable Sims contracting Crabs Lice STD.
Check to enable Sims contracting Crabs Lice through infested bedding.
Set a number of population percentage that will become Crab Lice Sleeper Agents.\n(Default: 22.5%)
Check to enable cum layers showing up on Sims bodies.
Check to allow applying of cum layers when using a condom.\nUncheck to disallow applying of cum layers when using a condom.
Change pregnancy settings.\n\nThese settings affect only pregnancy related functions that are the outcome of WickedWhims sex interactions.
Select to make Sims not get pregnant from sex.
Select to make Sims follow rules of their menstrual cycle for the pregnancy.
Select to make Sims get pregnant based on the set percentage chances.
Choose percentage chance of Player Sims getting pregnant from sex.
Choose percentage chance of NPC Sims getting pregnant from sex.
Select to use Sims lifespan set in game settings.
Select for life expectancy of: Forever (21-30 days per menstrual cycle)
Select for life expectancy of: 324 days (18-24 days per menstrual cycle)
Select for life expectancy of: 81 days (8-10 days per menstrual cycle)
Select for life expectancy of: 42 days (6-7 days per menstrual cycle)

Select for realistic menstrual cycle fertility chances.\n(0%-10%, 16%-27%, 31%-33%)
Select for boosted from realistic menstrual cycle fertility chances.\n(0%-10%, 20%-31%, 43%-78%)
Select for extremely high menstrual cycle fertility chances.\n(0%-10%, 50%-80%, 90%-100%, 100%)
Select for tampons and pads to perfectly prevent any blood leaking.

Select for tampons and pads to have normal blood leak preventing properties.
Choose Sims automatic use of tampons behavior.
Select for Sims to not use tampons automatically.
Select for Sims to use and change tampons right before it becomes overused (every 15 hours).
Select for Sims to use and change tampons right when there is any risk of them leaking (every 8 hours).
Choose Sims automatic use of pads behavior.
Select for Sims to not use pads automatically.
Select for Sims to use and change pads right before it becomes overused (every 16 hours).
Select for Sims to use and change pads right when there is any risk of them leaking (every 6 hours).
Check to allow NPC Sims get pregnant on their own from sex.
Select to make every birth control method prevent pregnancy with 100% success rate.
Select to make every birth control method have a realistic chance of failing to prevent pregnancy.
NPC Sims Birth Control Use Behavior
Change NPC Sims use of birth control behavior.
Select to make most of NPC Sims own and use birth control.
Select to make some of NPC Sims own and use birth control.
Select to make NPC Sims rarely own and use birth control.
Select to make NPC Sims not own birth control unless given by the player.

Makes Sims use birth control automatically when needed.

Condoms are used during any sex that can cause pregnancy.
Birth Control Pills is used once a day.

Sims will always accept sex propositions. Fully Check for Sims to always accept no matter the circumstances. Half Check for Sims to always accept except for gender preference incompatibility, cheating, or fear of pregnancy. Uncheck for Sims to not always accept.

{0.SimFirstName} just needs a few more minutes to get some relief. What {M0.he}{F0.she} didn't want was another Sim barging in and interrupting while they were trying to finish off!

Uh Oh! {0.SimFirstName} has caught {1.SimFirstName} in the middle of masturbating. Unfortunately for {0.SimFirstName}, {1.SimFirstName} could not keep control and the dam had to blow letting loose a deluge of satisfaction for {M0.his}{F0.her} eyes to see!

This awkward situation could have easily been avoided if one Sim had been that extra bit more careful to not get caught. Unfortunately for {1.SimFirstName}, the sudden appearance of another Sim meant that {M1.he}{F1.she} needed to keep it in {M1.his}{F1.her} pants. {0.SimFirstName} saw something they really didn't need or want to see and {1.SimFirstName} has been left embarrassed and unsatisfied.
Strangers always provide a wildcard to sex, but the touch of Sims unknown has left {0.SimFirstName} satisfied from {M0.his}{F0.her} moment of passion.
Wow, that was really something. Youth these days sure have a lot of energy and {0.SimFirstName} just loved watching that hot body move.
{0.SimFirstName}'s mind is running at superspeed with the idea that they could have been caught whilst in the middle of their dirty deed.
How Exciting! With all eyes on {0.SimFirstName} while they were having sex, {M0.he}{F0.she} couldn't help but feel even more aroused knowing that others were enjoying their show.
That was wonderful, there's nothing quite like the familiar touch of a lover's embrace. {0.SimFirstName} is truly glad to have shared a passionate moment with {M0.his}{F0.her} spouse.
After what can be described as a strange otherworldly encounter, {0.SimFirstName} can't help but feel full of life whilst being so close to death.
Amazing! Sex with several partners was just the sort of fun activity that {0.SimFirstName} needed.
That was pretty good. {0.SimFirstName} enjoyed their sexual encounter and was able to finish it off satisfied.

What even was that!? {0.SimFirstName} wants other Sims to really moan during sex but that was just anticlimactic... Was it because they weren't good enough?
Well that was... something. {0.SimFirstName} was left unsatisfied and uncomfortable from the sex they just had.
First time sex with a new Sim is always a memorable experience!
There's nothing like the thrill of sex outside. That was fun!
{0.SimFirstName} is really turned on by seeing {M0.his}{F0.her} partner have sex with someone else.

They're doing WHAT? {0.SimFirstName} is completely at a loss for words after catching {M0.his}{F0.her} child in the middle of having sex with their relative! {M0.He}{F0.She} has no idea how this started but this needs to END NOW!
How Scandalous! Those Sims were in the middle of an incestuous encounter! {0.SimFirstName} just saw something {M0.he}{F0.she} really shouldn't have.
{0.SimFirstName} got curious and now {M0.he}{F0.she} has no idea what they've stumbled across. From all that grunting, moaning and sweat it can't be good.
What do these kids think they're doing? {0.SimFirstName} just saw {M0.his}{F0.her} child in the middle of a dirty deed with another Sim! If they aren't using protection there'll be hell to pay!
Any Parent would be outraged to see their child going at it with a Sim who is much older than they are. This is disgusting, that Sim is too old and {0.SimFirstName}'s child is too young!
That was awkward! No parent expects to walk into a room and see their child masturbating. {0.SimFirstName} better make sure to knock next time before they enter the room!
That'll teach {0.SimFirstName} the importance of knocking! Their child isn't a little kid anymore, perhaps they do need their privacy.

Gross! No {M0.son}{F0.daughter} wants to see their parents getting it on. {0.SimFirstName} is going to be mentally scarred from this experience. {M0.He}{F0.She} did not enjoy this unpleasant lesson on their conception.
Wait... This is {0.SimFirstName}'s house. This isn't their house! {0.SimFirstName} is sure everyone's well aware of the phrase 'My Home Is Your Home', but this is going WAY TOO FAR!

{0.SimFirstName} is neck deep in stress right now and the last thing they want is to see other Sims enjoying themselves. That's unfair! {M0.He}{F0.She} wishes {M0.he}{F0.she} could be as carefree as those Sims right now!
{0.SimFirstName} utterly hates that Sim. The sight of them getting off has left a bad taste in {M0.his}{F0.her} mouth. Better move along before {M0.he}{F0.she} decides to do something stupid.

What is this feeling? {0.SimFirstName} cannot comprehend this deep sense of longing and melancholy after watching love that once was but can never be again. So this is what it's like to have a heart shatter.
That was just what {0.SimFirstName} needed. A rather exciting scene to relieve the stress {M0.he's}{F0.she's} been feeling. Perhaps now {M0.he}{F0.she} wont be so on edge.
Good for them! {0.SimFirstName} fondly remembers a pleasant encounter with that Sim and now seeing them enjoy themselves so vigorously makes {M0.him}{F0.her} just want to cheer them on.
If there's one thing that excites {0.SimFirstName} more than anything else, it's the sight of the one {M0.he}{F0.she} loves - naked, sweating and moaning.
{0.SimFirstName} had no expectations that today {M0.he}{F0.she} would find a Sim going at it right in front of {M0.his}{F0.her} eyes. You don't see that every day!
Sims immune to Crabs no longer contract Crab Lice.

Oh no! {0.SimFirstName} contracted Crab Lice! The intense itching caused by the little bugs living around {M0.his}{F0.her} genitalia is not going to clear out without proper treatment.

{0.SimName} acquired Crab Lice, parasitic insects that infest human genital area and cause intense itching. Typically contracted through sexual intercourse with infected Sims or from sleeping in infested beds.

Pubic Lice do not voluntarily leave, so proper treatment with specialized medication is required.
Lice Killer Shampoo can be ordered from a computer.
I'm all clean, no need to fear catching anything nasty from me.
I.. think I'm fine. Maybe? I might need to get tested to be sure.

Lice Killing Shampoo can only be used while taking a shower or a bath.

This complex formula of corrosive acid, slimy goo, and purple dye will completely remove any crabby bugs from your body and protect it for more than 24 hours. Our product definitely does not contain any chemicals that may cause damage to your health.\n\nThe Lice Killing Shampoo can only be used from Sim inventory and only during a shower or a bath.

{0.SimName} used the Lice Killing Shampoo and repelled all of the crabby looking bugs living around {M0.his}{F0.her} genitalia. With the powerful effect of the shampoo, {M0.he}{F0.she} doesn't have to fear contracting Crab Lice again for some time.

Oh Dear, blood seems to really be accumulating down in {0.SimFirstName}’s loins, staining {M0.his}{F0.her} clothes. {M0.He}{F0.She} should quickly apply either a tampon or pad. If {0.SimFirstName} doesn’t already have one present perhaps they could ask for help.

THE BLOOD! IT’S EVERYWHERE! {0.SimFirstName}’s clothes look like those of a victim in a horror movie and {M0.he}{F0.she} desperately needs either a pad or tampon ASAP before the situation gets any worse. Quickly! If there isn’t any protection on hand maybe another Sim can help.

There’s a light trickling sensation running down {0.SimFirstName}’s leg. It appears that {M0.his}{F0.her} pad has done it’s duty but in the end could only absorb so much. {0.SimFirstName} should deal with this by applying a replacement immediately, it’d be unhygienic to leave it in such a state.

The pad did it’s job but it could only absorb so much! Further bleeding has now ruined {0.SimFirstName}’s clothing. The blood has rushed down {M0.his}{F0.her} legs leaving noticeable stains across the material. This is a sorry state to be in, {0.SimFirstName} should make use of a replacement.

The pad tried as hard as it could but in the face of such a heavy flow it stood no chance. Blood has seeped through the cotton and down {0.SimFirstName}’s legs, ruining {M0.his}{F0.her} clothing the longer it lingers there. There’s definitely no further use out of this tampon, a replacement must be found ASAP!

There’s a light trickling sensation running down {0.SimFirstName}’s leg. <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted On Lot</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted On Lot</font> sign prevents all Sims from attempting to have sex on the lot. This sign can be placed anywhere on the lot to take effect.\n\nThe <font color='#3AAF69'>Sex Permitted In Room</font> sign overrides the effect of this sign for the room it is placed in. Making sex allowed only in that room.
**INVISIBLE** <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted On Lot</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted On Lot</font> sign prevents all Sims from attempting to have sex on the lot. This sign can be placed anywhere on the lot to take effect. It will disappear when in Live Mode.\n\nThe <font color='#3AAF69'>Sex Permitted In Room</font> sign overrides the effect of this sign for the room it is placed in. Making sex allowed only in that room.
<font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted In Room</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted In Room</font> sign prevents all Sims in a room with this sign from attempting to have sex. This sign has to be placed within a room to take effect, and it only affects Sims within that room.
**INVISIBLE** <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted In Room</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted In Room</font> sign prevents all Sims in a room with this sign from attempting to have sex. This sign has to be placed within a room to take effect, and it only affects Sims within that room. It will disappear when in Live Mode.

The <font color='#3AAF69'>Sex Permitted In Room</font> sign overrides the <font color='#EC262E'>No Sex Permitted On Lot</font> sign for the room it is placed in. Making sex allowed only in that room.
